# returns OK if $1 contains $2 # returns OK if $1 contains $2
strstr() { strstr() {
[ "${1#*$2*}" != "$1" ] [ "${1#*$2*}" != "$1" ]
} }
# returns OK if $1 contains $2 at the beginning # returns OK if $1 contains $2 at the beginning
str_starts() { str_starts() {
[ "${1#$2*}" != "$1" ] [ "${1#$2*}" != "$1" ]
} }
str_line_starts() { str_line_starts() {
while read a; do str_starts "$a" "$1" && return 0;done while read a; do str_starts "$a" "$1" && return 0;done
return 1; return 1;
} }
